title: Rooftop Terrace, USB Outlets & Fiber Internet, Large Windows
posting_body: Contact us for details on our specials!
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 521 Sq.
Berkeley’s modern apartments designed to make you happy.
Mellow out on a rooftop terrace with gas grills, fire pits, dining area and heaters; or mingle in the resident lounge and activity room.
Pamper your furry friend at the pet run and washing station.
Inside your home, large windows, 9-foot ceilings, quartz countertops, tile backsplashes and hard-surface flooring lend sophistication to your space.
Proximity to UC, public transit and Berkeley’s unique shops and restaurants connects you to the larger community.
USB Outlets & Fiber Internet, Energy Star Appliances, 9' Ceilings, Great Kitchens, LG Washers & Dryers, Large Windows, Hard Surface Flooring, 8' Solid Core Doors, Air Conditioning
Outdoor Heaters, Bike Room & Workshop, Rooftop Terrace, Dog Area & Washing Station
